title: Christian Schwartz
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Designers) : Christian Schwartz**

Born: New Hampshire, 1977

**Career History**  
1999: Graduated Carnegie Mellon University (Communications Design)  
1999: [MetaDesign](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/MetaDesign) Berlin  
2000: [Font Bureau](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Font%20Bureau)  
2001: [Orange Italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Orange%20Italic)

**Awards**  
His work has been honored by the [New York Type Directors Club](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/New%20York%20Type%20Directors%20Club), the [AIGA](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/AIGA), the [D&AD Awards](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/D%2526AD%20Awards), the [International Society of Typographic Designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/International%20Society%20of%20Typographic%20Designers), and the [Cooper Hewitt National Design Museum](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Cooper%20Hewitt%20National%20Design%20Museum).

**Fonts:**

1992  
 [Flywheel](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Flywheel) : Released by [FontHaus](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/FontHaus).

1993  
 [Atlas](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Atlas) : Released by [FontHaus](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/FontHaus), some styles unfinished  
 [Elroy](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Elroy) : Released by [FontHaus](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/FontHaus).  
 [Hairspray](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Hairspray) : Released by [FontHaus](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/FontHaus)

1994  
 [Twist](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Twist) : Released by [Precision Type](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Precision%20Type) and the [Agfatype Creative Alliance](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Agfatype%20Creative%20Alliance%20)  
 [Ant & Bee Art Fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Ant%20%2526%20Bee%20Art%20Fonts) : Drawings by [Jill Weber](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Jill%20Weber). Released by [FontHaus](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/FontHaus).

1995  
 [Zombie](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Zombie) : Released by [Precision Type](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Precision%20Type) and the [Agfatype Creative Alliance](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Agfatype%20Creative%20Alliance)  
 [Morticia](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Morticia) : Released by the [Agfatype Creative Alliance](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Agfatype%20Creative%20Alliance)

1996  
 [Gladys](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Gladys) (Unreleased)  
 [Bureau Grotesque](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Bureau%20Grotesque) : Designed with FB Staff including [David Berlow](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/David%20Berlow), [Tobias Frere-Jones](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Tobias%20Frere-Jones), [Jill Pichotta](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Jill%20Pichotta), [Richard Lipton](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Richard%20Lipton), and others. Mostly unreleased. Some styles commissioned by Entertainment Weekly.

1997  
 [Fritz](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Fritz) : Released by [Font Bureau](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Font%20Bureau).

1998  
 [Vendome](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Vendome) (Unfinished revival of a [Fran√ßois Ganeau](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Fran%C3%A7ois%20Ganeau) design orginally produced by [Deberny & Peignot](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Deberny%20%2526%20Peignot))

1999  
 [VW Headline Light](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/VW%20Headline%20Light) & [Heckschrift](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Heckschrift) : Art directed by [Erik Spiekermann](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Erik%20Spiekermann) and [Stephanie Kurz](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Stephanie%20Kurz). Commissioned by [MetaDesign Berlin](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/MetaDesign%20Berlin) for Volkswagen AG.  
 [Sandbox](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Sandbox) (Unfinished. Designed with [Chris Pacione](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Chris%20Pacione))  
 [Local Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Local%20Gothic) (Unfinished)

2000  
 [Pennsylvania](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Pennsylvania) : Released by [Font Bureau](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Font%20Bureau).  
 [Casa Latino!](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Casa%20Latino%21) : Art Direction by [Andy Cruz](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Andy%20Cruz). Designed with [Ken Barber](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Ken%20Barber). Released by [House Industries](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/House%20Industries).  
 [FF Din Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/FF%20Din%20Condensed) : Commissioned by [Michael Grossman](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Michael%20Grossman) for Harper's Bazaar. Not to be confused with retail version of FF DIN Condensed, designed by [Albert-Jan Pool](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Albert-Jan%20Pool)  
 [Poynter Agate Display](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Poynter%20Agate%20Display) : Commissioned by the [San Jose Mercury News](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/San%20Jose%20Mercury%20News) classified section  
 [LaDeeDa](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/LaDeeDa) : Art Directed by [Mia Hurley](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Mia%20Hurley). Commissioned by gURL.com  
 [Vectora Thin](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Vectora%20Thin) : Commissioned by O Magazine  
 [Addison](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Addison) (Unfinished)  
 [Boyband](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Boyband) (Unfinished)  
 [Bilbao](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Bilbao) (Unfinished)

2001  
 [Simian](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Simian) : : Art Directed by [Ken Barber](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Ken%20Barber) and [Andy Cruz](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Andy%20Cruz). Released by [House Industries](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/House%20Industries).  
 [Interstate Monospaced](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Interstate%20Monospaced) : Commissioned by Citigroup.  
 [Coop Black](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Coop%20Black) (lowercase) : Based on [Coop Black](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Coop%20Black) by [Ken Barber](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Ken%20Barber) and [Coop](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Coop). Commissioned by [House Industries](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/House%20Industries) for Toys R Us.  
 [David Yurman](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/David%20Yurman) : Commissioned by [Lipman Advertising](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Lipman%20Advertising) for David Yurman.  
 [Caslon's Egyptian](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Caslon%27s%20Egyptian) : Designed with [Miko McGinty](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Miko%20McGinty) and [Cyrus Highsmith](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Cyrus%20Highsmith). Commissioned by Red Herring.  
 [Benton Modern](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Benton%20Modern) : Commissioned by [Font Bureau](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Font%20Bureau) for the [Readability Series](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Readability%20Series)

2002  
 [Los Feliz](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Los%20Feliz) : Released by [Emigre](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Emigre).  
 [Luxury](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Luxury) : Designed with [Dino Sanchez](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Dino%20Sanchez). Released by [Orange Italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Orange%20Italic).  
 [Chalet Cyrillic](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Chalet%20Cyrillic) : Commissioned by [House Industries](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/House%20Industries) for Lego.  
 [Harrison](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Harrison) : Commissioned by Rafael Esquer at @radical.media.  
 [Reform](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Reform) Sketched italic for typeface by Anuthin Wongsunkakon. Released by [PsyOps](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/PsyOps).  
 [Masthead](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Masthead) (Unfinished)

2003  
 [Neutraface](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Neutraface) : Art Directed by [Ken Barber](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Ken%20Barber) and [Andy Cruz](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Andy%20Cruz). Released by [House Industries](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/House%20Industries).  
 [Amplitude](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Amplitude) : Released by [Font Bureau](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Font%20Bureau).  
 [Houston](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Houston) : Commissioned by [Roger Black](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Roger%20Black) at [Danilo Black, Inc.](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Danilo%20Black%2C%20Inc.), for the Houston Chronicle.  
 [FF Meta 3](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/FF%20Meta%203) : Designed by [Erik Spiekermann](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Erik%20Spiekermann). Portions drawn by [Richard Lipton](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Richard%20Lipton). Released by [FontShop International](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/FontShop).  
 [Eero](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Eero) : Art Directed by [Ken Barber](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Ken%20Barber) and [Andy Cruz](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Andy%20Cruz). Commissioned by [House Industries](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/House%20Industries) for the Dulles International Airport.  
 [Symantec](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Symantec) : Designed with [Conor Mangat](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Conor%20Mangat). Commissioned by [MetaDesign](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/MetaDesign) for [Symantec Corporation](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Symantec%20Corporation).  
 [ITC Officina Display](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/ITC%20Officina%20Display) : Designed by [Erik Spiekermann](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Erik%20Spiekermann) and [Ole Sch√§fer](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Ole%20Sch%C3%A4fer). Portions drawn by [Richard Lipton](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Richard%20Lipton) and [Cyrus Highsmith](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Cyrus%20Highsmith). Released by [Agfa](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Agfa)/ [Monotype](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Monotype)/ [ITC](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/ITC).  
 [Bailey](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Bailey) (Unfinished. Commissioned by [Danilo Black, Inc.](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Danilo%20Black%2C%20Inc.))

2004  
 [FF Unit](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/FF%20Unit) : Designed with [Erik Spiekermann](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Erik%20Spiekermann). Released by [FontShop International](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/FontShop).  
 [Farnham](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Farnham) : Released by [Font Bureau](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Font%20Bureau)  
 [Neutraface Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Neutraface%20Condensed) : Art Directed by [Ken Barber](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Ken%20Barber) and [Andy Cruz](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Andy%20Cruz). Released by [House Industries](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/House%20Industries).  
 [FF Bau](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/FF%20Bau) : Original idea by [Erik Spiekermann](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Erik%20Spiekermann). Released by [FontShop International](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/FontShop).  
 [Popular](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Popular) : Commissioned by [Robb Rice](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Robb%20Rice) at [Danilo Black, Inc.](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Danilo%20Black%2C%20Inc.), for Popular Mechanics.  
 [Bosch Serif & Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Bosch%20Serif%20%2526%20Sans) : Designed with [Erik Spiekermann](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Erik%20Spiekermann), production assistance by [Joshua Darden](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Joshua%20Darden). Commissioned by [United Designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/United%20Designers) for Bosch.

 [FF Oxide](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/FF%20Oxide) : Previously known as 5608. Designed for David Mullen at Double A Clothing. Released by [FontShop International](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/FontShop).  
 [FF Meta Headline](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/FF%20Meta%20Headline) : Designed by [Erik Spiekermann](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Erik%20Spiekermann), produced with [Joshua Darden](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Joshua%20Darden). Released by [FontShop International](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/FontShop).

2006  
 [Farnham Headline](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Farnham%20Headline) : Commissioned by Esterson Associates and de Luxe Associates.

2007  
 [Publico](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053520/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Publico) : Originally designed with Paul Barnes; production and design assistance by Kai Bernau. Commissioned by Mark Porter and Esterson Associates for _P√∫blico_.
